Academic Calendar

Important dates, deadlines, and events for the academic year.

2024-2025 Academic Year

DateEvent
August 25New Student Move-In Day
August 26-28New Student Orientation

September 2Labor Day (No Classes)

September 10Last Day to Add/Drop Classes

October 25Midterm Grades Due
November 1Last Day to Withdraw from Classes

December 13Last Day of Classes
December 16-20Final Examinations
December 23Fall Grades Due

Winter Break 2024-2025

DateEvent
December 21Winter Break Begins
December 24-25Christmas Holiday (University Closed)
December 31-Jan 1New Year's Holiday (University Closed)
January 2University Offices Reopen
January 5Residence Halls Reopen
January 13Winter Break Ends

Important Notices

Schedule Changes

All dates are subject to change. Please check the university website regularly for updates.

Religious Observances

Students requesting accommodations for religious observances should contact their instructors at least two weeks in advance.

Exam Policy

Final examinations must be taken at the scheduled time unless prior arrangements have been made with the instructor and approved by the dean.

Future Academic Years

2025-2026 Academic Year

Preliminary dates for the 2025-2026 academic year will be posted in Fall 2024.
